attributes.action: mandate all large urban settlements to provide a suitable number of lockable cycle racks at suitable intervals within their boundaries, and compel smaller settlements (i.e. villages and hamlets) to provide some form of bicycle rack within their boundaries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In order to encourage more cycling it should be mandatory for all authorities, large and small to provide suitable facilities for cyclists. County councils an other such bodies (unitary authorities, etc) should be forced to provide comprehensive cycle ways throughout their jurisdiction.
Those authorities responsible for large urban settlements (Town and City Councils, Borough and Parish councils, etc) should be compelled to provide lockable cycle racks suitably located within their bounds, and all smaller settlements (villages and hamlets) should be compelled to provide some form of bicycle rack within their bounds - i.e. not as comprehensive as the responsibilities of the larger authorities.

This would result in a similar system as is found in the Netherlands and most parts of Germany - which work very well and consequently result in many more cyclists.
